geo:GnssReceiver.geo:notes: Due to the limitation of available channels, only GPS+GLO+BDS satellites are tracked. More satellite systems will be tracked in near future.
Due to high CPU load in tracking GPS+GLO+GAL+BDS+QZSS+SBAS, the receiver was set to receive 3 satellite systems only until checking by manufacturer.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Survey and Mapping Office, Lands Department, HKSAR
